snippet: When law-abiding gun owners don’t have foolproof controls at home, their families may be at risk.
abstract: Editorial bemoans news that nearly two-thirds of gun deaths each year are suicides of troubled individuals with easy access to firearms; maintains that, along with more effective controls at federal level, individual gun owners have personal responsibility to institute foolproof controls at home to ensure that their most vulnerable loved ones are not left open to self-destruction.
lead_paragraph: When law-abiding gun owners don’t have foolproof controls at home, their families may be at risk.

headline.seo: Suicide Made Easier With Gun Access at Home
